EmailTemplate.name: 201704_APAC_Email_Du-875_JetCity_JRD.201704_APAC_Email_DU-875_JetCity_JRD
EmailTemplate.subject: The HAPP and DU-875 Limited Time Offer for Learjet Owners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.jetcity.com.au/]]>
The DU-875 and HAPP Upgrade for Learjet 40/45 by Honeywell and JetCity Engineering
Protect more than $850,000 of avionics in your Learjet 40 or 45 with Honeywell’s Avionics Protection Plan. For a limited time, you can save 15% on your new HAPP contract when you sign up before June 30.
As an added bonus to this HAPP offer, you’ll also receive a DU-875 LCD display when your current DU-870 is no longer in working condition.
If your old CRTs are still functioning, but you'd like to ditch your old displays for new DU-875's, Honeywell is currently offering a trade-in credit for Learjet 40 and 45 operators. For a limited time, you can save up to $160,000* when you trade-in all four displays.
Contact JetCity Engineering today to take advantage of these special offers.
Act now, this offer expires June 30.
CONTACT US <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/the-du-875-and-happ-upgrade-for-learjet-40-45-by-honeywell-and-jetcity-engineering]]>
*Operators can save up to $160,000 when they trade-in all four (4) of their DU-870 display units. Offer expires June 30, 2017.
